word: "There should be at our sanitariums intelligent men and women who can instruct in Christ's methods of ministry. Under the instruction of competent, consecrated teachers, the young may become partakers of the divine nature, and learn how to escape the corruptions that are in the world through lust. I have been shown that we should have many more women who can (16) deal especially with the diseases of women, many more lady nurses who will treat the sick in a simple way and without the use of drugs."
